mapper.insert: insert into antidote (id, title, `key`, val, remark, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{val,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select:
select * from antidote
and title like concat(#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and `key` like concat(#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and remark like concat(#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
